snippet.title: Glacier 3: The Meltdown - PC Gameplay (Steam)
snippet.description:
From the same studio responsible for the burning trainwreck that was FlatOut 3: Chaos & Destruction comes their older game that probably should have been frozen solid and tossed down the Himalayan mountains.

Glacier 3: The Meltdown (C) Team6 Studios, Funbox Media
Steam link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/267940/Glacier_3_The_Meltdown/
